thread.title: Facebook Plans Coding Site

author: Lindsay Gellman
title: Facebook Plans Coding Site
text:
Plenty of parents dream their children will someday become doctors or lawyers—but programmers, not so much. Facebook Inc. is hoping to change that.
On Wednesday, the social network is unveiling TechPrep, a new website aimed at parents and guardians that explains what programming is and highlights the career paths—and pay—awaiting skilled programmers. The site, available in English and Spanish, is geared toward people of color and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
